summary: A hobo accidentally stumbles onto a water spring, and creates a profitable way station in the middle of the desert.
cast: Jason Robards|Stella Stevens|David Warner|Strother Martin|Slim Pickens|L.Q. Jones|Peter Whitney|R.G. Armstrong|Gene Evans|William Mims|Kathleen Freeman|Susan O'Connell|Vaughn Taylor|Max Evans|James Anderson|Felix Nelson|Darwin Lamb|Mary Munday|William D. Faralla|Matthew Peckinpah|Victor Izay|Easy Pickens
title: La balada de Cable Hogue
